name: Mountain Roll (Ciock)
description:
Mountain Roll

My first GMTK jam and it falls on my gf's bday 😅
I did my best working on the game between dinners and evenings out partying. The important thing is that I enjoyed every single minute of this jam, making my first ever finished game!

What it is?

The theme of the jam was Roll the dice, so I made the dice roll over a mountain, that's it 😁

Start with the d4, which can't travel a lot, and reach for the d6, then go to the d8 with the new one, and so on...

I hope you'll find some challenge in it and have some good 5 minutes! 

See you next year
